title: Log Out to Securely Terminate Session
description: As a logged-in user, I want to log out of my account, so that I can securely terminate my session on the server and prevent unauthorized access to my data.
business_value: Enhances account security and builds user trust by providing explicit control over session termination. Prevents token reuse, which is a critical security measure.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successful logout","given":"I am logged in with an active session","when":"I click the 'Logout' button","then":"my client-side tokens are cleared, I am redirected to the login page, and my server-side session token is immediately invalidated."},{"scenario":"Attempt to use an invalidated token after logout","given":"I have logged out and my previous access token has been captured","when":"I attempt to make an authenticated API request using the old token","then":"the server rejects the request with a 401 Unauthorized error."}]
